Paul May

Seamus Heaney - The Underground

30 August 2013

Leaving is difficult. Moving is difficult. Starting is difficult. Doing all three at once has been, at times, difficult.

I heard this today for the first time, to my shame. I thought of Cliona, our journey forward together, and not looking back.

This line.

To end up in a draughty lamplit station After the trains have gone, the wet track Bared and tensed as I am, all attention For your step following and damned if I look back.

Quite something.
